name: Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster
description: The effect of drinking this is like having your brains smashed out by a slice of lemon wrapped round a large gold brick.

name: Vogon Ale
description: A beer known for its bitterness, much like the poetry of its namesake.

name: Zaphod's Zest
description: A beer with a zesty twist, as unpredictable as its namesake.
